title: I Am A Teenage Witch
teaser: For some people, being a witch isn't just for Halloween. From Youth Radio, Akemi Weaver sent us this report to explain why.
contentencoded:
With Halloween upon us, images of witches abound. But for some, witching is a year-round thing. Youth Radio’s Akemi Weaver sent us this story to explain why.

  • WatchÂ Akemi Weaver’s video “How To Cast A Love Spell”

Guest

  • Akemi Weaver, 15-year-old contributor to Youth Radio.
